question: 追う
sourceAnswer: to{} chase/run-after/pursue/follow-after | follow-(a-set-order,-a-trend,-etc.) | drive-out/get-rid-of/oust/expel | drive-(e.g.-a-herd) | to-be:pressed-(e.g.-for-time)
sourceMnemonic: This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>follow</kanji> so the verb version is <vocabulary>to follow</vocabulary> (it's also <vocabulary>to chase</vocabulary>, because when you follow something you are chasing it too).
sourceReadingMnemonic: You've learned this reading already, so you should know how to read this word!
